titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
1933 TUTTLE Oct 19 S.D. 41 rue M. le Prince 1615 Avery Street Parkersburg, West Virginia 3 mos 1 v 30 dep 30 SB sent cheque $2 June 21 7 Oct 19 Tom Jones vol II Oct 25 Oct 25 Early Tudor Dramas - Nov 4 Nov 4 Farewell to Arms Nov 9 Nov 9 Peregrine Pickle vol I Nov 13 13 Complete Poems of Skelton Nov 25 25 Latin Dictionary Dec 7 Use of Poetry Dec 2 Dec 2 Dec 7 Keats' Poetry Dec 23 Dec 23 Buddenbrooks vol I Dec 28 28 " vol II Dec 29 29 Art Winner take Nothing Dec 30 30 Sterne's Works 2 vols card Feb 22
Renewed Feb 22 - May 22 1934 30f Feb 22 Etruscan Places Mar 1 1 Poems of Eliot March 3 Hound & Horn March 9 3 Red Bread March 9 9 Humanly Uprooted March 12 12 Ultramarine March 20 20 Letters of Keats vol I 6 April 6 April Mozart's Operas (Dens) 14 6 After Strange Gods 0.50 April 9 14 Death in Venice April 17 14 Pascarella Family April 17
TUTTLE April 17 Children & Fools April 19 " 19 Twilight in Italy 20 20 Beyond the Mexique Bay 0.50 21 21 Oxford Book of Sixteenth Century Verse 23 23 Goodman of Paris 30 A 26 26 Sea & Sardinia (extra) 30 April 30 Morning in Mexico May 3 May 3 Ford's Plays May 3 5 Mozard, S. Sitwell May 7 Draft of XXX Cantos " 12 " 7 Alps & Sanctuaries 15 " 12 Guermantes Way I 19 15 " II 22 19 Mozart's Operas (Dent) 0.50 22
